name: Wispr Flow for Windows
label: Stop typing, start speaking: 3x faster dictation on PC & Mac
maker_introduction:
Hey Product Hunt,

I’m Tanay, co-founder & CEO of Wispr Flow. A few months ago, we released Flow 1.0 on Mac to help people write at the speed of thought — no cramped fingers, no jarring typos. The response was incredible, but one question kept coming up from a lot of ProductHunters: “When do Windows users get to ditch their keyboards?”

Today, Wispr Flow is finally available on Windows — bringing voice-first dictation (and instant auto-edits) to PCs everywhere.

⭐ Here’s what to expect:

3x Faster Than Typing
Speak naturally and watch Flow handle the formatting and grammar in real time.

Adaptive Style
Flow picks up on your personal quirks—so your text sounds like you wrote it yourself, not a bot.

Easy Voice Commands
Need a fresh tone or a quick AI rewrite? Say the command, and Flow transforms your text without leaving your current app.

Flexible & Cross-Platform
Whether you’re on Slack, Word, or any web-based tool, Flow integrates seamlessly—plus it syncs with our Mac version if you switch between devices.

New Privacy Mode
With a new Privacy mode, none of your dictation data will be stored or used for model training by us or any third party (zero data retention).

⭐ Our vision:

We want to build an intuitive interface where
interacting with it feels as natural as interacting with people
it understands you, perhaps even better than you understand yourself
it is seamlessly accessible, and feels like an extension of your identity
Letting people express their thoughts with Flow is our first step in that journey, with a lot more coming later this year.
I’d love to hear your thoughts—drop a comment below, share feedback, and if you find Flow helpful, I’d really appreciate your upvote.

Thanks for checking us out and for helping us shape the future of voice computing!

-- Written with @Wispr Flow

With ❤️
Tanay & The Wispr Flow Team

description: Sherloq is a Collaborative SQL Repository. Using the AI-powered plugin, SQL users automatically save, organize, share, and document queries on-the-fly, without leaving the editor. Companies use Sherloq as the single source of truth for all their queries.
label_zh: 在一个地方管理所有 SQL，直接在编辑器中操作
content_zh: Sherloq 是一个协作式的 SQL 仓库。通过使用 AI 驱动的插件，SQL 用户可以实时保存、整理、分享和记录查询，而无需离开编辑器。公司可以将 Sherloq 作为所有查询的唯一可信来源。

name: OG PM Agent: Beta Release
label: Your AI Product Manager
maker_introduction:
Hey Product Hunt! Have you ever got stuck in the endless loop of product scoping and requirement gathering?

I'm Nijansh, the co-founder of OpenGig, and I'm thrilled to be launching the beta version of our PM Agent - An AI Product Manager here on Product Hunt!

💡 Why PM Agent?
Attends all meetings with you (Online/Offline) and keeps track of all the product ideas discussed.
Is perfect at classifying feature discussions in the meetings. No more back & forth hassle for product requirement gathering.
Generates Meeting summary, PRD, and Plans sprints in Real Time.
Generates a detailed product roadmap with task priority, estimates, acceptance criteria, all in Minutes instead of weeks!
All it needs is your expert supervision.

Our vision:
Product Strategy + Task Management + Notetaker + AI  in one place so all you need is an IDE to start coding!
No more switching between 10 tools, for note taking, task management, PRD creation, and sprint planning.
We help Product Teams know exactly what they should be working on next.
Our PM Agent will make Product Teams launch 10x faster.

What makes us different?
There are many SOTA code generation tools, but the output from these tools relies on a well-crafted PRD/Product roadmap/Plan of action, and there is no AI for that.
PM Agent is the perfect combination of Project management tools like JIRA + Meeting note takers like Otter + ChatPRD in a simple UI that our early users can’t stop talking about.
PM Agent + Cursor/Replit/Lovable/Bolt is the perfect combination for VIBE CODING!

🎁 Special Launch Offer!
To celebrate our MVP launch, we’re giving everyone:
1500 minutes of FREE credit
Priority support during the launch period

👉 Try PM Agent today and transform how you manage your product roadmap
https://pm.opengig.work

We can’t wait for you to join us on this journey! Upvote if you’re as excited as we are—much more coming soon. 💙🔥
- Team  OpenGig
description: PM Agent is your AI Product Manager that attends all your meetings, creates detailed summaries, and converts business discussions into Product Requirement Document including acceptance criteria for every sprint in real time keeping all stakeholders aligned.
topics_zh:
业务 

直译后重新意译，以符合中文表达习惯：

生产力
content_zh: OG PM Agent: Beta Release 是你的人工智能产品经理，它可以参加所有会议，生成详细的总结，并将业务讨论实时转化为产品需求文档，包括每个冲刺的验收标准，确保所有相关人员保持一致。

description: Omlet is a component analytics tool for React. You can now use Omlet directly in VS Code and analyze how and where your React components (and their props) are used as you're coding — helping you confidently update, clean up and maintain your component library.
label_zh:
在 VS Code 中获取 React 组件使用情况的洞察

在 VS Code 中查看 React 组件的使用情况
content_zh: Omlet 是一个用于 React 的组件分析工具。你现在可以直接在 VS Code 中使用 Omlet，在编写代码时分析你的 React 组件（及其属性）的使用情况和位置，帮助你更自信地更新、清理和维护组件库。
